variations.content: Architected and implemented a component library using React, TypeScript and Storybook, reducing development time for new features by 40% and improving UI consistency across 12 product offerings.
Led the migration from Redux to React Context API and Hooks, resulting in a 30% reduction in bundle size and improved application performance metrics across all platforms.
Mentored a team of 6 junior developers through knowledge sharing sessions and code reviews, improving code quality by 25% as measured by decreased bug reports and technical debt.
Developed a real-time analytics dashboard using Node.js, Socket.io, and D3.js, processing over 10,000 events per second with less than 100ms latency.
Implemented a microservices architecture using Docker and Kubernetes, improving system scalability and reducing deployment time from hours to minutes.

Designed a real-time chatbot flow designer using Next.js, gRPC, and WebSockets, with PostgreSQL and Redis for high-performance database operations. Improved operational efficiency by 20% through optimized workflows.

summaries.content:
Results-oriented Full-Stack Developer with 7+ years of experience delivering high-performance web applications.
Expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, Express.js, React, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, REST APIs, WebSocket and security principles. Proven ability to design, develop, and maintain robust backend systems, secure APIs, and real-time communication solutions.

Innovative Frontend Architect with a passion for creating scalable and maintainable component systems. Specialized in performance optimization and modern JavaScript frameworks with a track record of mentoring junior developers and driving technical excellence across development teams.

projects.name: Joonz
projects.content:
Joonz as a startup SaaS solution, transforms links into powerful marketing tools.
Engineered a scalable URL management platform using Node.js and Express.js backend, with React and tanstack react-query for the frontend dashboard. Implemented MongoDB for link analytics tracking, Socket.io for real-time statistics, and integrated AWS Lambda for serverless QR code generation, serving 50K+ daily requests

projects.name: Interactive Data Visualization Framework
projects.content: Developed an open-source data visualization library built on D3.js and React that simplifies the creation of complex interactive charts. Features include responsive layouts, animation transitions, and accessibility enhancements. Currently used by over 2,000 developers worldwide with 750+ GitHub stars.
